title: Scp 8642 34
content:
You decide the best thing to do would be to look around and investigate this department yourself. After all, it’s your job as an auditor to see if the Foundation’s money is being used properly! Looking around you realize that this room is full to the brim filing cabinets and papers, with no obvious organization to them. The sound of rustling papers fills the air, and not just from the trio of men in the back. There must be plenty of paper-rustlers hidden in the maze of filing cabinets, you realize, and you wonder how many people actually work here.

Listening intently, your ears pick up a sound that, surprisingly, is not rustling papers. It’s the clicking of a keyboard, not too far off. Turning to find the source, you see Greg,  the man Hannah handed your clipboard to, sitting at his computer setup, typing and clicking away at his two keyboards and a variety of other devices. The setup is a massive conglomerate of towers and monitors, and you wonder what on Earth he needs that much computing power for.

You feel your curiosity being split between the mountains of papers and the mountain on technology. After a moment of reflection, you decide to…

||= [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-8642/offset/12 Investigate the papers.]||= 34||= [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-8642/offset/35 Investigate the computer.]||
